p: Gene expression quantification was performed using htseq-count version 0.5.3p9 ( http://www-huber.embl.de/users/anders/HTSeq/doc/count.html), the GENCODE version 17 annotation gtf file ( http://www.gencodegenes.org/releases), and the alignment BAM files. The intersection_nonempty mode and the unstranded library type (−−stranded = no option) were specified as parameters for the htseq-count run, with all other options left as default.
